littleTitleProjet: Code an application to visualize data on maps
resultRecap: We were a team of 5 students that were working together full-time for 2 weeks on this projects, we had to create an application in visual studio 2022 using C#, extract data on the internet to put it in a database and then show that data on custom maps in the application, I was the project leader of our group and had to supervise the team. I used the software MindView to manage the team
skills: Linking the application to the database with Python

photoProjet.desc: The visualization, you can pick data on the right
